channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 油价因美联储利率信号和中国房地产行业的支持而小幅上涨
item.description: Global oil prices climbed in early trade on Thursday, supported by signals from the U.S. Federal Reserve on a possible start to rate cuts and as China unveiled new support measures for its embattled property market.翻译:受美联储可能开始降息的信号以及中国针对陷入困境的房地产市场推出新的支持措施的支撑，全球油价周四早盘上涨。
item.author: Katya Golubkova

item.title: 美联储降息预期转向5月，美元徘徊在7周高点附近
item.description: The dollar hovered close to the highest level in seven weeks against the euro on Thursday, after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell pushed back on the idea of a first U.S. interest rate cut as soon as March.翻译:周四，在美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔推翻了美国最早在三月份首次降息的想法后，美元兑欧元徘徊在七周来的最高水平附近。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 出口订单推动中国工厂活动扩大——财新PMI
item.description: China's factory activity expanded in January thanks to stable growth in output, quicker logistics and the first rise in new export orders since June, helping lift business confidence to a nine-month high, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday.翻译:周四的一项私营部门调查显示，由于产量稳定增长、物流加快以及新出口订单自 6 月以来首次增加，中国 1 月份工厂活动有所扩大，帮助将商业信心提升至九个月高点。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲思考美联储的影响，债券仍看好降息
item.description: Asian shares faltered on Thursday after Wall Street took a late spill, while investors stuck to bets for sizable cuts in U.S. interest rates this year even if the kick off might now be a little later than first hoped.翻译:华尔街股市晚间暴跌后，亚洲股市周四下跌，而投资者仍押注美国今年将大幅降息，即使现在开始降息的时间可能比最初希望的要晚一些。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 芯片销量激增、中国反弹，韩国出口连续第四个月增长
item.description: South Korea's exports rose for a fourth month in January, as a rebound in sales to China and the biggest surge in chip shipments in six years provided a boost to the trade-reliant economy at the start of 2024.翻译:韩国 1 月份出口连续第四个月增长，原因是对中国的销售反弹以及六年来最大的芯片出货量激增，在 2024 年初提振了依赖贸易的经济。
item.author: Jihoon Lee, Cynthia Kim

item.title: 调查显示，在华美国企业略显乐观，但仍保持谨慎态度
item.description: U.S. businesses in China are feeling more optimistic about bilateral relations and their profitability potential than a year ago, but most will still limit new investment in the country for now, a survey published on Thursday showed.翻译:周四公布的一项调查显示，在华美国企业对双边关系及其盈利潜力比一年前更加乐观，但大多数企业目前仍会限制在华新投资。
item.author: Casey Hall

item.title: 特斯拉将磷酸铁锂电池供应链引入美国 - 彭博新闻
item.description: Tesla is expanding its battery facility in Sparks, Nevada to bring the supply chain for cheaper lithium iron phosphate batteries (LFP) to the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.翻译:据彭博社周三报道，特斯拉正在扩建在内华达州斯帕克斯的电池工厂，将更便宜的磷酸铁锂电池（LFP）的供应链引入美国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储兑现3月削减希望，市场影响开始
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Alden Bentley

item.title: 美国指控中国公民向伊朗走私美国制造的电子产品
item.description: U.S. authorities have charged four Chinese nationals with crimes related to the smuggling of U.S.-made electronic components, including some with possible military use, to Iran, the Justice Department said on Wednesday.翻译:美国司法部周三表示，美国当局指控四名中国公民涉嫌向伊朗走私美国制造的电子元件，其中包括一些可能用于军事用途的电子元件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 瑞士加入欧盟最新制裁措施，禁止进口俄罗斯钻石
item.description: Switzerland will ban the import of Russian diamonds in line with the latest round of European Union sanctions designed to punish Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine, the government said on Wednesday.翻译:瑞士政府周三表示，根据旨在惩罚莫斯科入侵乌克兰的最新一轮欧盟制裁，瑞士将禁止进口俄罗斯钻石。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 五角大楼呼吁中国公司帮助北京军方
item.description: The United States on Wednesday added more than a dozen Chinese companies to a list created by the Defense Department to highlight firms it says are allegedly working with Beijing's military, as part of the broader effort to keep American technology from aiding China.翻译:美国周三将十几家中国公司添加到国防部创建的名单中，以突出显示据称与北京军方合作的公司，作为阻止美国技术援助中国的更广泛努力的一部分。
item.author: Idrees Ali, Alexandra Alper, Michael Martina

item.title: Netgear在美国反垄断案中起诉华为专利许可
item.description: Computer networking company Netgear has sued Huawei [RIC:RIC:HWT.UL] in California federal court, claiming the Chinese tech giant broke U.S. antitrust law by refusing to license its patents on reasonable terms.翻译:计算机网络公司 Netgear 在加州联邦法院起诉华为 [RIC:RIC:HWT.UL]，声称这家中国科技巨头拒绝以合理条款许可其专利，违反了美国反垄断法。
item.author: Blake Brittain

item.title: 中国碧桂园计划以 5.7 亿美元出售伦敦开发项目
item.description: Chinese property developer Country Garden has put its 450 million pound ($570 million) residential development in East London up for sale as it presses ahead with asset disposals at home and overseas after defaulting on its offshore debt.翻译:中国房地产开发商碧桂园已将其位于伦敦东区价值4.5亿英镑（合5.7亿美元）的住宅开发项目挂牌出售，该公司在海外债务违约后正在推进国内外资产处置。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国汽车制造商因华为计算单元出现生产问题而受到打击
item.description: Some Chinese automakers have had to delay deliveries of flagship models due to production issues with a computing unit made by tech giant Huawei (HWT.UL), five people with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:五位知情人士表示，由于科技巨头华为 (HWT.UL) 制造的计算单元出现生产问题，一些中国汽车制造商不得不推迟旗舰车型的交付。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 销量预计将温和增长，但对中国市场的担忧依然存在
item.description: Apple iPhone sales likely rose 3% in the key holiday period, the best growth in five quarters, but analysts expect a tough year for the company in China, where it faces regulatory headwinds and resurgent competition from Huawei.翻译:苹果 iPhone 销量在关键假期期间可能增长 3%，这是五个季度以来的最佳增长，但分析师预计该公司在中国将面临艰难的一年，因为该公司在中国面临监管阻力和来自华为的激烈竞争。
item.author: Yuvraj Malik

item.title: 台军模拟中国将演习变成攻击
item.description: Taiwan's military on Wednesday simulated a scenario where China suddenly turns one of its regular drills around the island into an actual attack, on the same day China staged another "combat readiness patrol" near Taiwan.翻译:台湾军方周三模拟了中国突然将其一次环岛定期演习转变为实际攻击的场景，同一天中国在台湾附近进行了另一次“战备巡逻”。
item.author: Fabian Hamacher

item.title: 美国如何准备应对中国入侵台湾
item.description: When U.S. and Australian troops practiced amphibious landings, ground combat and air operations last summer, they drew headlines about the allies deepening defense cooperation to counter China's growing military ambitions.翻译:去年夏天，当美国和澳大利亚军队进行两栖登陆、地面作战和空中作战演习时，有关盟国深化防务合作以对抗中国日益增长的军事野心的报道成为头条新闻。
item.author: Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali

item.title: 中国副总理敦促在市场暴跌之际加大对上市公司的支持
item.description: Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout.翻译:据新华社报道，在股市持续暴跌之际，中国国务院副总理何立峰周一呼吁加大对上市公司的支持，以帮助稳定资本市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国护照持有者可以免签前往哪些国家？
item.description: China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists.翻译:中国因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 自我隔离三年，并于 2023 年重新开放边境，并与部分国家签署了免签证协议，以鼓励其公民旅行，这对吸引中国游客的外国目的地来说是一个福音。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大承认香港法院的清算令
item.description: China Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment.翻译:中国恒大周一承认，香港法院下令对这家全球负债最重的房地产开发商进行清算，原因是该公司在拖欠债券两年多后未能提供具体的重组计划。
item.author: Reuters
